name: your summer break ends here
description:
⚠️ Jam Version is unpolished due to lack of time ⚠️

▬

Ruin the summer break of your rival. A micro point and click adventure.

Controls: Mouse

▬

Game was made for LOWREZJAM 2021.
The goal was to make a game in a 64x64px resolution.

▬

Notes: 

  • English isn't my native language, there are most likely many mistakes
  • I wanted to include more minigames and another ending but had no time in the end (the current ending scene was done in the last hour of the jam as a replacement for another more elaborate scene) More about it here: Blog

▬

Credits: 

Art & code by me. Music by:

BGM:【Do you have any evidence?】
by MusMus https://musmus.main.jp/

BGM:  【Beach2】
by PeriTune
